mapper.insert: insert into user_mst values( 0, #{email}, #{username}, #{password}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{booker}, #{profile_image}, #{provider}, #{role}, now(), now() );
mapper.select: select count(phone) from user_mst where phone = #{phone};
select count(email) from user_mst where email = #{email};
select count(username) from user_mst where username = #{username};
select count(booker) from user_mst where booker = #{booker};
